thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 5 of 10
thread.title: kent kongsdal

author: kent kongsdal
title: kent kongsdal
text:
For people who have been raiders but lack time to raid on fixed days every week og for people who has a challenge in finding a guild raiding the instances wanted - wowvendor is a very good alternative. I myself have been in wow since the beginning but i don't have the time to raid so much now - but with wowvendor I can go through the important raids, make achievements where I'm heavily dependent on others. What makes this work is in my opinion the following:
- Very good and strong web with all instance on all levels
- Very good organization (fast feedback and perfect execution)
- Really pro players (but no arrogance)
- Helpfulness and politeness also when you ask questions or sometimes get lost in a raid
I have used wowvendor and will continue to do that in order to continue enjoy the challenging raids combined with all the time i do quests i.e. on my own or with friends. Most importantly, I'm still in my guild (now for 10 years) with many friends. It's a very good combination
